ofx:section.ofx:title: Data Source
ofx:section.ofx:paragraph: Data Sources describe the origin for individual data shown in a map. A data source is specific to a layer, but it's possible that one layer is based on multiple data sources and the same data source can be used in different layers.
The Entity Relationship model for data sources is shown in Figure .
